Platform.Title: Streptococcus pneumoniae TIGR4 v6 codY
Platform.Manufacture-Protocol: Amplicon array on ArrayIt superamine slides

Sample.Title: Spneu D39 zinc slide 1

Channel.Extract-Protocol: 50 ml of GM17-broth was inoculated in 4 replicates 1:50 with a frozen stock, and these cultures were statically grown at 37°C. Samples for RNA isolation were taken when the cultures reached an optical density (OD600) of 0.3 (mid-log growth). RNA was isolated and purified using the High Pure RNA isolation kit (Roche diagnostics) as described (PMID: 17085554). Contaminating genomic DNA was removed by treatment with RNase-free DNase I (Roche diagnostics). RNA was isolated from three replicate cultures. Synthesis, subsequent labeling of cDNA, and microarray hybridization was performed as described (PMID: 17085554 and 15907200).
Channel.Label: Cy3
Channel.Label-Protocol: Synthesis of cDNA and indirect Cy-3/Cy-5-dCTPs labeling of 15–20 µg of total RNA was performed with the CyScribe Post labeling kit (Amersham Biosciences) according to the supplier's instructions.

Channel.Source: wild-type grown in GM17 with 0.25 mM ZnSO4 OD 0.3
Channel.Extract-Protocol: 50 ml of GM17-broth was inoculated in 4 replicates 1:50 with a frozen stock, and these cultures were statically grown at 37°C. Samples for RNA isolation were taken when the cultures reached an optical density (OD600) of 0.3 (mid-log growth). RNA was isolated and purified using the High Pure RNA isolation kit (Roche diagnostics) as described (PMID: 17085554). Contaminating genomic DNA was removed by treatment with RNase-free DNase I (Roche diagnostics). RNA was isolated from three replicate cultures. Synthesis, subsequent labeling of cDNA, and microarray hybridization was performed as described (PMID: 17085554 and 15907200).
Channel.Label: Cy5
Channel.Label-Protocol: Synthesis of cDNA and indirect Cy-3/Cy-5-dCTPs labeling of 15–20 µg of total RNA was performed with the CyScribe Post labeling kit (Amersham Biosciences) according to the supplier's instructions.

Sample.Hybridization-Protocol: Hybridization (16 h at 45 °C) of labeled cDNA was performed in Ambion Slidehyb #1 hybridization buffer (Ambion Europe) on superamine glass slides (Array-It; SMMBC), containing technical replicates.
Sample.Scan-Protocol: Slides were scanned using the Genepix 4200AL DNA micro array slide scanner. Quantification of the signal of the spots on slides was done with ArrayPro 4.5
Sample.Description: Streptococcus pneumoniae D39 Wild type grown in GM17 versus the same strain grown in GM17 + ZnSO4
Sample.Data-Processing: Slide data were processed and normalized using MicroPreP, and CyberT implementation of the Student's t test (PMID: 15130795).

Column.Name: CH2_SIG_MEAN
Column.Description: D39wt grown in GM17 + 0.25 mM ZnSO4

Column.Name: VALUE
Column.Description: LN transformed ratio of normalized/processed data (CH2/CH1)

Series.Title: Spneu D39 wildtype grown in GM17 versus GM17 + 0.25 mM ZnSO4
Series.Summary: This study addresses the response of Streptococcus pneumoniae to zinc. The wild-type strain D39 was grown in GM17 and GM17 with 0.25 mM of ZnSO4. The transcriptome under these conditions was compared by using microarrays. Keywords: transcriptome analysis of D39 wild-type compared with its isogenic glnPA double mutant
Series.Overall-Design: The wild-type strain D39 was grown in 4 biological replicates in GM17 and in GM17+0.25 mM ZnSO4 to an Optical Density at 600 nm of 0.3. From these cultures samples were prepared for transciptome determination with in-house printed microarrays covering the genomes of several S. pneumoniae species. The GM17 samples (CH1) and GM17+ZnSO4 samples (CH2) were labeled with Cy5 or Cy3. Samples were hybridized to glass-microarray slides. This work is part of a publication that is likely to be released in june/july 2008: 'Opposite effects of Mn2+ and Zn2+ on the PsaR-mediated expression of the virulence genes pcpA, prtA and psaBCA of Streptococcus pneumoniae" by Kloosterman et al.
